New Records: Anthony Edwards set a record for the most three-pointers made in the first nine games of a season with 50
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored 37 points, had six rebounds, five assists, one steal, and one block in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards is averaging 29 points, 5.9 rebounds, and 3.6 assists per game this season
Others: The Timberwolves won the game 127-102, bringing their record to 6 wins and 3 losses
Anthony Edwards did not play in the fourth quarter during the game
Anthony Edwards was the first pick in the 2020 NBA Draft
Anthony Edwards is a two-time All-Star and helped lead the Timberwolves to the Western Conference finals for the first time since 2004
Anthony Edwards won a gold medal with Team USA at the 2024 Olympics in Paris over the summer
